info.title: WebAImpetus API Documentation
info.description: Complete API documentation for MyWorkstation application with CRUD operations for all resources

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Filter by environment (Development, Testing, Acceptance, Production)

get.description: Returns paginated list of hospital staff with details

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status (Active, On Leave, Inactive, Suspended)

post.description: Creates a new hospital staff record

get.description: Returns a single hospital staff record with details

put.description: Updates an existing hospital staff record

get.description: Returns paginated list of patient logs with filters

post.description: Creates a new patient log entry

get.description: Returns a single patient log record
Return an array of resource objects, themselves in array format

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: JSON encoded payload controlling pagination, sorting and filters.

post.description: Create a new resource object, from "posted" parameters

get.description: Return the editable properties of a resource object

put.description: Add or update a model resource, from "posted" properties

delete.description: Delete the designated resource object from the model

get.description: Returns paginated timesheets for a business with optional filters (status, employee, project, dates, invoicing).

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: JSON encoded pagination, sorting, and filtering options.

get.description: Retrieve a single timesheet by UUID.

404.description: Timesheet not found or not running

get.description: Returns paginated work orders for a business. Supports the list filter payload used by the front-end and QA harness.

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: Optional response format override (defaults to json).

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: JSON encoded object supporting pagination, sorting, and filter keys (uuid_business_id, q).

post.description: Create a new resource object, from "posted" parameters

get.description: Return the properties of a resource object

put.description: Add or update a model resource, from "posted" properties

delete.description: Delete the designated resource object from the model

bearerAuth.description: Enter your JWT token in the format: Bearer {token}

tags.name: Deployments
tags.description: API endpoints for managing service deployments across DTAP environments

tags.name: Launchpad
tags.description: API endpoints for managing bookmarks and quick links

tags.name: Timesheets
tags.description: Track billable and non-billable time entries.

tags.name: WorkOrders
tags.description: Manage work orders raised for suppliers.
